text: ame rata ane divasane potani kudaratani nisani'o banavi, ratani nisanine to ame andhakaramaya banavi didhi che ane divasani nisanine prakasita kari didhi che, jethi tame potana palanaharani krpa sodhi sako ane etala mate pana ke varsoni ganatari ane hisaba kari sako ane dareka vastunum varnana ame khuba ja spasta rite karyum che
